example_en: The nurse gave me an injection.
He works as a software engineer.
I need to consult a lawyer.
The accountant prepared the tax reports.
The architect designed a beautiful building.
The chef prepared a delicious meal.
The pilot landed the plane safely.
Firefighters saved the family from the fire.
I go to the dentist twice a year.
The journalist wrote an interesting article.
The designer created a new logo.
Call the electrician to fix the wiring.
The plumber fixed the broken pipe.
The bus driver was very friendly.
The baker makes fresh bread every morning.
example_ka: მცხობელი ყოველ დილით ახალ პურს აცხობს.

example_en: I go to the barber once a month.
I have a job interview tomorrow.
Send your resume to the company.
The company hired ten new employees.
He was fired from his job.
She got a promotion at work.
My colleague helped me with the project.
She has five years of experience.
She works part-time at the cafe.
I work full-time at the office.
He works as a freelancer from home.
There are two vacancies in our department.
We have a meeting at 10 AM.
We finished the project on time.
The director made the final decision.
She's a senior executive at the company.
The project coordinator organized the team.
The financial analyst reviewed the reports.
The scientist discovered a new element.
The librarian helped me find the book.
The career counselor gave good advice.
The interpreter helped during the meeting.
The artist painted a beautiful landscape.
The writer published a new novel.
The surgeon performed a complex operation.
The therapist helped with my recovery.
The astronomer discovered a new star.
The sailor worked on a cruise ship.
The police officer helped the child.
The judge made a fair decision.
The interior decorator redesigned the room.
example_ka: ინტერიერის დეკორატორმა ოთახი ხელახლა დიზაინი გაუკეთა.

example_en: The office cleaner works at night.
The fitness trainer helped me exercise.
The basketball coach trained the team.
The athlete won a gold medal.
The hairdresser styled my hair beautifully.
The beautician gave me a facial treatment.
The massage therapist relaxed my muscles.
The tailor altered my suit perfectly.
The welder joined metal pieces together.
The mason built a stone wall.
The cable installer fixed our internet.
The repairman fixed our washing machine.
The building inspector checked the structure.
The land surveyor measured the property.
The auditor reviewed the financial records.
The stock broker advised on investments.
example_ka: საფონდო ბროკერმა ინვესტიციების შესახებ რჩევა მისცა.

example_en: The bank teller processed my deposit.
The store clerk helped me find items.
The street vendor sold fresh fruit.
The real estate agent showed houses.
The mayor opened the new park.
The governor signed the new law.

She has an aptitude for math.

example_ka: მისი თანამდებობის ვადა ათ წელს გაგრძელდა.

example_en: The intern earned a small stipend.
